entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
